attributes.action: Free Choice of Internet Service Provider in Hull
attributes.additional_details:
every should have the right to choose who they want to pay for internet and not be forced into the so called provider in hull at the momentlets get as many signatures as we can and pass the word around

Is it not about time we had a better internet service than the one we receive at the moment from Kingston Communications in Hull, if you were to go any were els you would get better broadband speed.


But if you live in Hull you don't get that choice, you get to choose which provider you get your electricity , water and gas from so shouldn't we get the same kind of choice when it comes to our internet provider i want to set up a petition to get something done about this i want here your view's on the crapy internet service that we have put up for so long
